column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Common Bond has become one of the most beloved bakeries in Houston. They do everything well. For a weekday breakfast
column2: they offer a wonderful soft scramble. Perfectly cooked eggs
column4: served with toast and homemade jam. The coffee is spot on. The weekend wait is worth the time. We enjoyed the chocolate croissant
column7: don't forget the coffee. Common Bond also offers an extensive macaroon selection
column8: but the pastries and loaves of bread are the way to go.
